Time-Sensitive Logic.Marriage Creation: Marriage can only be created once due to the majorEvents.length == 0 restriction in createMarriage.
Time-Sensitive Logic.Message Timestamps: Each message and major event includes a timestamp, storing the time-sensitive nature of these entries.

Conditional Logic Paths.Marriage Status Condition: areMarried modifier conditionally allows only married partners to send certain transactions.
Conditional Logic Paths.Ether Transfer Condition: sendMessage includes a conditional path for transferring ether only when msg.value > 0.
